Dialogue.Page: You know, there have been other creatures who have visited before you.
Most of them met the same fate.
Say, let me catch you up to speed.
Here's something from about 250,000 years ago:
'NYLOX: Wait, what's happening? Why are the clouds disappearing?'
'QUIAX: Er, I don't know, but it doesn't seem safe.'
'WELBAR: Um... Guys, do you see that?'
'NYLOX: See what!? All I've noticed is that the clouds have disappeared!'
'QUIAX: What the heck is- What- Is that-? Am I-?'
'QUIAX: This... this has to be some sort of illusion!'
'NYLOX: No, it can't be. We're all seeing it, right?!'
'WELBAR: <color=red>(hyperventilating)</color> THEY'RE COMING FOR US! THE PLANETS ARE ALIVE!'
'QUIAX: THIS DOESN'T MAKE ANY SENSE! WHAT DO WE DO?!'
'NYLOX: Okay, everybody stay calm, I have a plan!'
